events: The witch has slain a goblin with a bounty on his head. We've earned a portion of the reward as tax income.
Gossip is spreading about a heroic purple witch slaying goblins in the lower quarter. She's become something of a folk hero!
The sultan's caravan is resting in town. Our citizens have been trading with them, producing a small amount of tax income.
Guards say somebody was eaten by an enchanted treasure chest of some variety in the middle of the night.
The sultan's caravan is resting in town. Our citizens have been trading with them, producing a small amount of tax income.
The sultan's caravan has left town. As a gesture of goodwill, they have left behind a small pouch of gold.
The circus is in town, bringing joy to all those who visit! It also happens to bring in a nice bit of gold...
Gossip is spreading about a heroic purple witch slaying goblins in the lower quarter. She's become something of a folk hero!
Guards say somebody was eaten by an enchanted treasure chest of some variety in the middle of the night.
The circus is in town, bringing joy to all those who visit! It also happens to bring in a nice bit of gold...
The circus has packed up and left town, but not without leaving behind even more gold coins!
The jester's show was loved by the court, and put everybody into a happy mood.
The workers we captured and recruited have sped up our building processes, resulting in more tax income.
Papers have been posted around town spreading news of the destruction of the western forest. The people feel quite guilty about this.
The festival in the town square celebrating the town's 500th citizen is still going strong, bringing happiness to all those who attend.
The circus is in town, bringing joy to all those who visit! It also happens to bring in a nice bit of gold...
The festival in the town square is winding down and people are getting back to their normal lives.
The circus is in town, bringing joy to all those who visit! It also happens to bring in a nice bit of gold...
The circus has packed up and left town, but not without leaving behind even more gold coins!
The witch has slain a goblin with a bounty on his head. We've earned a portion of the reward as tax income.
Gossip is spreading about a heroic purple witch slaying goblins in the lower quarter. She's become something of a folk hero!
Mermaids in the ocean have been giving our fishermen a lot of trouble, resulting in a loss of profits.
Workers at a construction site arrived in the morning to find all of their lumber stolen, setting work back by weeks.
There's a party going on at the tavern tonight. The citizens rejoice, singing and dancing together into the night.
The plant people are hosting a party at the garden tonight, sharing their fresh fruits and vegetables with the villagers.
The circus is in town, bringing joy to all those who visit! It also happens to bring in a nice bit of gold...
